title: 820-00840 when i open lid macbook turns on itself when its turned off
message:
have str[U]ange problem with this model. determined several problems[/U]

1) when i open lid macbook turns on itself when its turned off

2) when system is turned on and it asking for  admin password if you connect charger it shows 100% and after about 5 seconds it shows correct battery percentage.both ports doing same. e.g if battery is 73% charged ,after plug charge will be imediatelly 100% and after 5 seconds 73% again

3) if you will enter admin password and than you will connect charger than it doesn't shows that 100%

4) customer also said that sometimes macbook was showing charging icon without charger connected but i haven't seen this problem during 2 days checking this macbook

[LIST]
[*]i tried change battery and also changed both CD3215
[/LIST]

title: 820-00840 when i open lid macbook turns on itself when its turned off
message: 1 is expected behavior for this model. 2 and 3 are system bugs, I see this happening here all the time and there's nothing you can do to solve it as I said, it's system bug. 4 is not normal unless it shows charging icon on login screen, if it happens just on login screen, it's also a OS bug, already seen this specially when machine hibernated after battery reaching to 0%.

title: 820-00840 when i open lid macbook turns on itself when its turned off
